Yeah, you need that "full range of motion".

I can't wait to see how you move.

I'm used to everybody watching me, but not like this...
Show me your dance moves!
Oh, you're gonna have to impress if you're gonna draw more eyes than me.

There better be a barrel chest under there.

Hey... uh... shake your hips. That's, uh, how you dance... or something.

*huff* *huff* *huff*

Hey Kim, could you show me that "cheerleader" dance now?

text.content: What a great performance! Let's give her a hand!
